scripts.build: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude 'docs' --exclude 'dogu' --jobs unlimited -ptvi run build
scripts.build:actions: yarn workspaces foreach --include '@dogu-actions/*' --jobs unlimited -ptvi run build
scripts.build:archive: yarn workspaces foreach --jobs unlimited -ptvi run build:archive
scripts.build:packages: yarn workspaces foreach --include '@dogu{-tech,-private,-dev-private}/*' --jobs unlimited -ptvi run build
scripts.build:projects: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude '@dogu{,-private,-actions}/*' --exclude 'dogu' --jobs unlimited -ptvi run build
scripts.clean: yarn workspaces foreach --jobs unlimited -ptvi run clean
scripts.clean:packages: yarn workspaces foreach --include '@dogu/*' --jobs unlimited -ptvi run clean
scripts.format: yarn workspaces foreach --jobs unlimited -ptvi run format
scripts.format-package-json: yarn prettier-package-json --write package.json packages/**/*/package.json projects/*/package.json prebuilds/*/package.json samples/*/package.json actions/*/package.json
scripts.lint: yarn workspaces foreach --jobs unlimited -ptvi run lint
scripts.newbie: yarn run newbie:localdev && yarn newbie:cicd && yarn run newbie:nm-space
scripts.newbie:cicd: yarn set version 3.3.1 && yarn run newbie:cicd:dirty
scripts.newbie:cicd:dirty: yarn install && yarn workspaces foreach --exclude 'dogu' --jobs unlimited -ptvi run newbie
scripts.newbie:nm-space: ts-node scripts/nm-space/mirrorCopyOnly && ts-node scripts/nm-space/run run 'yarn install --no-immutable'
scripts.publish:github:dev: cross-env DOGU_RUN_TYPE=development yarn workspaces foreach -ptvi --jobs unlimited run publish:github
scripts.publish:github:prod: cross-env DOGU_RUN_TYPE=production yarn workspaces foreach -ptvi --jobs unlimited run publish:github
scripts.publish:npm:dev: cross-env DOGU_RUN_TYPE=development yarn workspaces foreach -tvi --jobs unlimited run publish:npm
scripts.publish:npm:prod: cross-env DOGU_RUN_TYPE=production yarn workspaces foreach -tvi --jobs unlimited run publish:npm
scripts.rebuild: yarn run clean && yarn run build
scripts.rebuild:packages: yarn run clean:packages && yarn run build:packages
scripts.reset: yarn run clean-lock && yarn install && yarn run rebuild
scripts.start:console: yarn workspace console-web-server run start & yarn workspace console-web-front run start
scripts.start:debug: yarn workspaces foreach --jobs unlimited -ptvi run start:debug
scripts.third-party:download:build: yarn run third-party:download && yarn run third-party:build
scripts.watch: yarn workspaces foreach --include '@dogu{-tech,-private,-dev-private,-actions}/*' --jobs unlimited -pvi run watch
